roleset.name: outline, define, specify features or boundaries

role.descr: entity whose features are being defined

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to define.01 and delineate.01. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Arg 0 is the 'defined by'
example.text: The area around the needle localization was defined by a brown-tan area, 3.0 cm x 2.1 cm.
example.arg: The area around the needle localization
by a brownish-tan area, 3.0 cm x 2.1 cm.
